article.title: U.S. Army Procures Chemical Agent Detection Kits
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Smith's Detection, Edgewood, Maryland, was recently awarded a nearly $29 million contract for the procurement of 4,801 joint chemical agent detectors with warranties, and 4,901 communication adapter kits.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
